casebody.data:
Charles WATLINGTON, individually and as Father of Jesse Watlington, Deceased, and Alda Watlington, individually and as Mother of Jesse Watlington, Appellant/Petitioner(s),
v.
NORTHSTAR FUNERAL SERVICES OF FLORIDA, LLC, d/b/a Fort Myers Memorial Gardens Funeral Home and Northstar Cemetery Services of Florida, LLC, Appellee/Respondent(s). CASE NO.: 2D17-4590 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Second District. April 09, 2018

DECISION WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

Dismissed.
